Description: Four joining sherds giving much of rim and neck of North Ionian pottery krater; three of four spool handles partly preserved, one of them having lost the handle inside the spool; inside of neck glazed with at least one added red band lined in white; reserved below; on top of rim, stopt maeander, one outside blobs; between each pair of handles reserved panels; one depicting a bird, two others hanging lotus and bud chain; shoulder glazed as far as preserved.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.309)
